name: Stonewood Honey Berry
additionalNotes:
Good Times Stonewood cigars are made from all-natural tobacco product with no homogenized components and aged for optimum flavor. Good Times Stonewood cigars feel and look reminiscent to a "roll your own" cigar!
These Stonewood cigars are available in two flavors: Sweet and Honey Berry. Good Times once again created a unique recipe and excellent blend, for a exquisite NATRUAL [sic] cigar. Guaranteed fresh foil packaging seals in the moisture and flavor, and will make you think it was sent straight from the farm.
